nodes.text: Ellik was a female Human who worked for the Republic Intelligence.

During the Clone Wars, she posed as a Central Republic Audit Office agent when she accompanied Besany Wennen and two Null Arcs, Mereel and Jaing, in inspecting the Republic Treasury Audit Division computers for a virus. Since the virus was Jaing's creation, he managed to fool her into thinking it was a case of industrial espionage.
